meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1362.

td.p: John Patlan, a social worker from Austin, Texas
Joyce Patterson, a homemaker from Hackettstown, New Jersey
Jim McManus, a corporate trust administrator from Richmond, Virginia

tr.td: POT LUCK
FAMOUS QUOTES
THE GRAMMY AWARDS
HISTORY
ARKANSAS
GRAVE MATTERS

darkroom
